definition: the front line/the attack (e.g. football forwards)
thread/string/wire/line/CL:條|条[tiao2],股[gu3],根[gen1]/(after a number) tier (unofficial ranking of a Chinese city)

sentences.english: Changing the line of attack an attacker is crucial in advanced Aikido.
sentences.chinese: 更改攻擊線攻擊者是至關重要的先進合氣道。

sentences.english: They are a strong team, in attack they are good.
sentences.chinese: 他們很強大，尤其是攻擊線。
